title: If Tupac Shakur didn’t die but instead hid all this time, will he make a full come back in music? First of all his main fear was reincarnation and he predicted that before he died. - Quora

response.answer_text: The amount of ego these people have. Tupac must be eating garbage and stool somewhere as a pig, or a must be a bat. Becoming human again is very rare, and requires you to have accumulated great merit over one’s life. It is millions and millions of years before we get to become human again. Till then, it’s an endless grind in the never-ending cycle of birth and death. You don’t want any of it? Well, you should’ve devoted your life to God in your human life, shouldn’t you? But what did you do? You snorted drugs, guzzled alcohol, slaughtered animals, and had a lot of sex. You think you’re going to get anything good out it? Forget it. It’s like Voldemort expecting a grand welcome in the heavens upon death.
